name: X Bar
author: Romeo Asis

sections.description:
xbar Headline is a tool for making your special event, news headline, sales coupon etc. to standout at the top of your wordpress site.

with xbar headline you’ll attract visitors and make it easy for them to know that you have an offer or an announcement.

xbar headline is good for:

  • An Announcement
  • A Sale/Discount Coupon
  • What’s new
  • New Product Launching

  • and many more…

    you can use it in your General Purpose.
sections.installation:
xbar Headline Installation:

Just Activate and Install and your good to go!

Customization/Look and Feel:

use this custom field names with a hex value color

  1. xbar_content_color
  2. xbar_background
  3. xbar_title_background
  4. xbar_title_color
sections.faq:
Any support for this plugin?

you can email me at meotester2014@gmail.com for your questions/support/inquiries/troubleshooting for this plugin.

short_description: Make your introductory texts standout and noticeable with xbar headline! use this plugin in your marketing promos, latest news, sale coupons etc.
